question: What is the maximum home loan I can get with an annual income of $75,000 and no existing debt?
true_answer: With $75,000 annual income and no debt, maximum loan possible is approximately $300,000.

steps.content: What is the maximum home loan I can get with an annual income of $75,000 and no existing debt?
Plan: 1) Retrieve knowledge for income to loan ratio. 2) Use calculator to estimate maximum loan. 3) Have home_loan_agent verify with knowledge base. 4) Supervisor final check.
Retrieving knowledge on income to loan ratio standards.
Typically, lenders offer up to 4x annual income if no debt is present.
I read somewhere that it could be 5x, is that possible?
Checking for any cases or conditions where 5x income could apply.
5x may apply with exceptional credit and low interest rates. More typically 4x is standard.
Calculating maximum loan based on 4x income.
Maximum loan calculated as $300,000 based on 4x $75,000.
Would a higher credit score affect this calculation?
Higher credit scores can lead to better interest rates and higher potential loan offers.
With $75,000 annual income and no debt, maximum loan possible is approximately $300,000.
